it.unimi.dsi.webgraph.examples
Class ErdosRenyiGraph

java.lang.Object
  it.unimi.dsi.webgraph.examples.ErdosRenyiGraph

public class ErdosRenyiGraph
extends Object

Models an Erdos-Renyi type of graph, where the number of nodes is fixed, and there is a fixed probability that an arc is put between any two nodes (independently for every pair).

Note that the graph returned by generate() is not random-access: you can, however, make a mutable copy of the returned graph and then take its immutable view.
